short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Come get your word of the day!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Duma is a simple, clean word-of-the-day app. It fetches a new word and its definition everyday, and comes with a series of beautiful backgrounds provided by Unsplash.

Install to expand your vocabulary and prettify your New Tab page!
